price: Indeed, We showed him the way, whether he is grateful or ungrateful.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
